data.name: Spaceland: Cooperative
data.detailed_description:
Get ready for a new update with a co-op storyline campaign. In this prequel story you’ll find out how Jim went from Academy graduate to acting Space Ranger officer.

  • Six new co-op story battles you can play through with your friends
  • Two additional heroes, Harvey and Theo, will help Jim and Barret take down a gang of smugglers
  • Several new types of enemies have plenty of unexpected tactical surprises for you
  • The impressive space map will expand the world of Spaceland for you and help you learn more about the Star Federation
  • And, needless to say, at the end of the storyline campaign you can expect a challenging boss with a couple of aces up its sleeve
data.about_the_game:
Get ready for a new update with a co-op storyline campaign. In this prequel story you’ll find out how Jim went from Academy graduate to acting Space Ranger officer.

data.short_description: Meet the new DLC with a cooperatative story campaign. In this prequel to the main plot you will learn about Jim's way from an Academy graduate to an active officer of Space Rangers.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 550 or AMD Radeon HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 760 or AMD Radeon R9
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
